alert.note: Alert for Dickey; La Moure; McIntosh (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 2:14PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN LAMOURE, DICKEY AND SOUTHERN MCINTOSH COUNTIES THROUGH 245 PM CDT... At 214 PM CDT, strong thunderstorms were located capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Verona to 5 miles northwest of Ellendale to 9 miles northeast of Long Lake to Artas. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts to 40 mph, and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Verona around 220 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Ellendale. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
